title: Employee Onboarding Form
description: Welcome to our team! Please complete this form to help us set up your employment

welcome_message.title: Welcome to Our Team!
welcome_message.description: Congratulations on joining our company! We're excited to have you on board. This onboarding form will help us collect the necessary information to set up your employment, benefits, and systems access. Please complete all sections as accurately as possible. If you have any questions, please contact your HR representative or hiring manager.

onboarding_instructions.title: Instructions
onboarding_instructions.description:
• Please complete all required fields marked with an asterisk (*)
• Have your identification documents ready for upload (passport, driver's license, etc.)
• Have your banking information available for direct deposit setup
• You'll need your tax information (SSN/TIN, tax withholding preferences)
• The form will save automatically as you progress
• You can return to complete the form later if needed
• Submit the form at least 3 business days before your start date

acknowledgment_text.title: Acknowledgment
acknowledgment_text.description: By submitting this form, I certify that the information provided is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false statements or omissions may result in denial of employment or dismissal. I authorize the company to verify the information provided and to contact the references listed.
